properties.name: Agrigento, Sicily
properties.description: Posted by Batman77This Greek city was founded around the sixth century B.C. The city is mostly known for the Valley of Temples. The Valley of Temples is a valley filled with temples to greek gods. The valley includes temples to Zues, Concord, Hera, and several others. The city was originally named Akragas and founded around 582 B.C. The Romans changed the name to Agrigentum, when they took the city over. The Valley of Temples is rich in history and artifacts.

properties.name: Gettysburg
properties.description: Posted by Batman77Gettysburg is located in southern Pennsylvania. This was the site of the famous battle of Gettysburg during the American Civil War. Gettyburg was founded in 1786 by James Gettys. The Battle of Gettysburg took play from July 1 through July 3 1863. The outcome of this battle was bloody. For example, there was over 50,000 deaths or captures duing this battle. The North won this battle. This was a huge turing point in the war for the North. Gettysburg is a very historic place.

properties.name: Mesa Verde
properties.description: Posted by Batman77Centuries ago, the Anasazi tribe of Indians created cliff dwellings within mountains. These dwellings were found in Southwestern Colorado. Congress put money asside so that this area may be national park in 1906. It was named Mesa Verde because of the table top rock that towers over all of the dwellings. The indians built their homes out of sandstones and adobe mortar. The largest of these dwellings is the Cliff palace. Much like a apartment building, Cliff Palace has over 200 seperate rooms. Mesa Verde attracts many vistors each year.

properties.name: Pauda, Italy
properties.description: Posted by Batman77Pauda is the oldest city in northern Italy. Padua is also called the "La Citta del Santo" which means the city of the saint. The saint it refers to is St. Anthony. He is buried at the church called The Basilica of St. Anothny. The city id home to the Basilica of St. Anthony. St. Anthony was a saint who was sometimes called the Evangelical Doctor. The church also houses the tongue of St. Anthony. Padua is a very beautiful town with a great history.

properties.name: Pompeii
properties.description: Posted by Batman7740.7508333 14.487083Pompeii was a Roman city. The city was founded between 7th and 6th century B.C. It was covered by a volcano. Mt.Vesuvius erupted without any notice. Everything and Everyone in the twon was coverd by the ash and buried. Then in 1738, men working for the King of Naples dicovered the town that had been buried in the volcanic ash for several centuries. However, the first real excavation started in 1764. The leader of the excavation was Karl Weber. He and his team of archeologists found all of the buildings and people in their exact place when the volcano exploded. One intreesting fact about their find was that the peoples faces had the same expression on them as before.

properties.name: Rome
properties.description: Posted by Batman77Rome is the capital of Italy. It is also known as the Eternal City. It is named this because it has been thriving for over 2000 years. Stretching from Southern England to Northern Africa Rome was once considered the greatest empire in the world. Rome is the center of the Roman Catholic Church. During the 1500\'s the popes brought in many skilled artists and architectures to design their beautiful city. Rome has many ruins that satnd from ancient Rome, such as the Colosseum(the displayed picture). The Colosseum is one of many of the ancient ruins of Rome.

properties.name: San Antonio
properties.description: Posted by Batman77San Antonio is located in Southwestern Texas. It has been under control of many countires such as France, Spain, and Mexico. The battle of the Alamo was fought here in 1836. In this battle everyone in the fort died but fought proudly to defend thier nation. San Antonio was founded in 1718 by the Spanish. The city also has a famous River walk. The San Antonio River takes tourists on a boat ride of the city. The River is boarded by many shops and restuarants. This city is very unique.

properties.name: St. Augustine
properties.description: Posted by Batman77St. Augustine is the oldest town in the United States of America.it was settled by the Spainish in 1565. St. Augustine was under Spanish rule until 1763. The British then tool control of St. Augustine. However, Spain took the town back from the British in 1783. Then the Unted States took control of it in 1821. One of the greatest features of the town is the Castillo de San Marcos. This fort was built by the Spanish in the 1600\'s now is a national monument. St. Augustine is now an important tourist site with rich history for Americans. This is a great historic town.

properties.name: Stratford Upon Avon
properties.description: Posted by Batman77This is a famous town that is located in Engalnd. As one of the oldest towns in England it serves as William Shakespeare\'s birthplace. William Shakespeare is a famous poet who wrote many poems and plays. The town itself dates back to medieval times. A Shakespeare memorial has been erected in honor of his work. The original theatre of Shakespeares time was burnt down and a new one was built in 1932. His house has also been a popular attraction.

properties.name: Venice, Italy
properties.description: Posted by Batman77Venice is located in Italy. this is not an ordinary city, however. Venice is a city that lies on about 120 small islands. Instead of having roads and cars it has canals and boats. Venice is a qiuet and beautiful town. Venice was among the most important cities in the Adratic. Venice was founded in 452 A.D. It reached the highest point of its power by defeating the Geneans in a long ballte in the 1400\'s. The city became known as the "Queen of the Adratic" at his time. it was called this because of the stong trading abilities it had with other countries. Now one of Venice\'s key points is the amounto f tourism it recieves around the world. Venice is a great place to visit.
